parameters.name: AclUuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the access control policy.

To delete an access control policy, you must specify the UUID of the policy. You can call the [DescribeControlPolicy](~~138866~~) operation to query the UUID.

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
The direction of the traffic to which the access control policy applies.

Valid values:

*   **in**: inbound.
*   **out**: outbound.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response.

Valid values:

*   **zh** (default)
*   **en**

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the traffic.
